title: Chassis.0.91.0
description: This is the schema definition for the Chassis resource.  It represents the properties for physical components for any system.  This one object is intended to represent racks, rackmount servers, blades, standalone, modular systems, enclosures, and all other containers.  The non-cpu/device centric parts of the schema are all accessed either directly or indirectly through this resource.
specification: This resource shall be used to represent a chassis or other physical enclosure for a Redfish implementation.

ChassisType.description: The physical form factor of this resource.

enumDescriptions.Rack: An equipment rack, typically a 19-inch wide freestanding unit
enumDescriptions.Blade: An enclosed or semi-enclosed, typically vertically-oriented, system chassis which must be plugged into a multi-system chassis to function normally
enumDescriptions.Enclosure: A generic term for a chassis that does not fit any other description
enumDescriptions.StandAlone: A single, free-standing system, commonly called a tower or desktop chassis
enumDescriptions.RackMount: A single system chassis designed specifically for mounting in an equipment rack
enumDescriptions.Card: A loose device or circuit board intended to be installed in a system or other enclosure
enumDescriptions.Cartridge: A small self-contained system intended to be plugged into a multi-system chassis
enumDescriptions.Pod: A collection of equipment racks in a large, likely transportable, container
enumDescriptions.Expansion: A chassis which expands the capabilities or capacity of another chassis
enumDescriptions.Sidecar: A chassis that mates mechanically with another chassis to expand its capabilities or capacity
enumDescriptions.Zone: A logical division or portion of a physical chassis that contains multiple devices or systems that cannot be physically separated
enumDescriptions.Sled: An enclosed or semi-enclosed, system chassis which must be plugged into a multi-system chassis to function normally similar to a blade type chassis.
enumDescriptions.Shelf: An enclosed or semi-enclosed, typically horizontally-oriented, system chassis which must be plugged into a multi-system chassis to function normally
enumDescriptions.Other: A chassis that does not fit any of these definitions

ChassisType.specification: ChassisType shall indicate the physical form factor for the type of chassis.

Manufacturer.specification: The value of this property shall be the name of the organization responsible for producing the chassis. This organization might be the entity from whom the chassis is purchased, but this is not necessarily true.

Model.description: The model number for the chassis
Model.specification: The value of this property shall be the name by which the manufacturer generally refers to the chassis.

SKU.specification: The value of this property shall be the stock-keeping unit number for this chassis.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number for this chassis
SerialNumber.specification: The value of this property shall be a manufacturer-allocated number used to identify the chassis.

Version.specification: The value of this property shall be a string that indicates the producers or manufacturer's version of the chassis.

PartNumber.description: The part number of this chassis
PartNumber.specification: The value of this property shall be a part number assigned by the organization that is responsible for producing or manufacturing the chassis.

AssetTag.description: A user assigned asset tag for this chassis
AssetTag.specification: The value of this property shall be an identifying string used to track the chassis for inventory purposes.

IndicatorLED.description: The indicator LED for the chassis, used to identify the chassis.  This LED can be manipulated by the user.

enumDescriptions.Unknown: The state of the Indicator LED cannot be determined

IndicatorLED.specification: This value of this property shall contain the indicator light state for the indicator light associated with this system.

LogService.description: A reference to the logs for this chassis.
LogService.specification: The value of this property shall reference a resource of type Collection with a MemberType of LogService.

ComputerSystems.description: An array of references to the computer systems contained in this chassis.  This will only reference ComputerSystems that are directly and wholly contained in this chassis.
ComputerSystems.specification: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that this physical container is associated with and shall reference a resource of type ComputerSystem.  If a ComputerSystem is also referenced in a Chassis that is referenced in a Contains link from this resource, that ComputerSystem shall not be referenced in this Chassis.

ManagedBy.description: An array of references to the managers contained in this chassis.
ManagedBy.specification: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that manages this chassis and shall reference a resource of type Manager.

ThermalMetrics.description: A reference to the thermal metrics (fans, cooling, sensors) for this chassis.
ThermalMetrics.specification: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that represents the thermal characteristics of this chassis and shall be of type ThermalMetrics.

PowerMetrics.description: A reference to the thermal metrics (power supplies, power policies, sensors) for this chassis.
PowerMetrics.specification: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that represents the power characteristics of this chassis and shall be of type PowerMetrics.

MiscMetrics.description: A reference to the various other metrics (presence, etc.) for this chassis.
MiscMetrics.specification: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that represents the non-power & non-thermal characteristics of this chassis and shall be of type MiscMetrics.

ContainedBy.description: A reference to the chassis that this chassis is contained by.
ContainedBy.specification: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that represents the chassis that contains this chassis and shall be of type Chassis.

Contains.description: An array of references to any other chassis that this chassis has in it.
Contains.specification: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that represents the chassis that this chassis contains and shall be of type Chassis or another Collection.

links.description: Contains the links to other resources that are related to this resource.
